Text: Please give feedback on whether or not it's working, so downlaoders know. Thanks

thanks for the torrent .. but, sorry, i am a newbie.
How to make this pkg work? i'm already on rogero 4.30 cfw and reactpsn installed.
also how to activate file on your exdata?

@gumalinx place the exdata folder in root of usb drive (drive palced in 2nd USB port) and launch reActPSN as a new user 'aa'. After successful activation, the 'aa' account will change to another name such as "...reActPSN###"
yup.. tried many times, but after selected the game, screen goes black and then back to the XMB automatically with error warning (80028F17). Any idea then?
@gumalinx Did the account name change from "aa"?
@gumalinx ensure the account name changed from 'aa'

I did, and "aa" changed to "reactpsn v2.0...".
I'm on rogero 4.40 v 1.03 react psn 2.24b. Anything wrong with my CFW??
@gumalinx This may be the bad version. I made an International FF XII classic and then a normal one. the INTL was reported unworking by several people.
use my other copy. with [PS2 Classics] in the title. Sorry m8
